thread.title: Vestal girls claim STAC title; Ithaca boys top Vestal
thread.title_full: Vestal girls claim STAC title; Ithaca boys top Vestal

title: Vestal girls claim STAC title; Ithaca boys top Vestal
text:
Vestal girls claim STAC title; Ithaca boys top Vestal 
By wbng sports October 19, 2015 Updated Oct 19, 2015 at 11:46 PM EDT 
Vestal, NY (WBNG Binghamton) The Vestal girls soccer team and the Ithaca boys soccer team both captured their second consecutive STAC championships Monday. 
Vestal 2, Chenango Forks 0 Madeline Beaulieu scored on a booming strike from about 30 yards out in the 29th minute and Alivia Meyer added a second half goal to lead the Golden Bears past the Blue Devils. 
Vestal has still not allowed a goal in 2015. 
Ithaca 7, Vestal 0 Tristian-Cornell Roberts netted a hat trick and Ithaca scored three goals in a three-minute span to capture its second straight STAC crown.
